description: During my higher vocational education, I pursued full-time studies focused on preparing for a career as a Java developer. This comprehensive program encompassed a wide range of technologies and methodologies, including Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Test-Driven Development (TDD), REST API development, agile methodologies, relational databases, microservices architecture, Spring Boot, Java EE, Docker, Maven, as well as JavaScript and Vue.js.
Swedish high school. Primarily focus on acquiring fundamental skills in networking, HTML, CSS, and introductory Python programming.
